Package akka.pattern

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AskSupport
    This object contains implementation details of the &ldquo;ask&rdquo; pattern.
    BackoffOptions
    Configures a back-off supervisor actor.
    BackoffReset  
    BackoffType  
    ExplicitAskSupport
    This object contains implementation details of the &ldquo;ask&rdquo; pattern, which can be combined with "replyTo" pattern.
    FutureRef<T>
    A combination of a Future and an ActorRef associated with it, which points to an actor performing a task which will eventually resolve the Future.
    FutureTimeoutSupport  
    GracefulStopSupport  
    HandleBackoff  
    PipeToSupport  
    PromiseRef<T>
    A combination of a Promise and an ActorRef associated with it, which points to an actor performing a task which will eventually resolve the Promise.

    Backoff
    Builds back-off options for creating a back-off supervisor.
    Backoff$
    Builds back-off options for creating a back-off supervisor.
    BackoffOnRestartSupervisor
    Back-off supervisor that stops and starts a child actor when the child actor restarts.
    BackoffOptionsImpl  
    BackoffOptionsImpl$  
    BackoffSupervisor
    Back-off supervisor that stops and starts a child actor using a back-off algorithm when the child actor stops.
    BackoffSupervisor.CurrentChild
    Send this message to the BackoffSupervisor and it will reply with BackoffSupervisor.CurrentChild containing the ActorRef of the current child, if any.
    BackoffSupervisor.CurrentChild$  
    BackoffSupervisor.GetCurrentChild$
    Send this message to the BackoffSupervisor and it will reply with BackoffSupervisor.CurrentChild containing the ActorRef of the current child, if any.
    BackoffSupervisor.GetRestartCount$
    Send this message to the BackoffSupervisor and it will reply with BackoffSupervisor.RestartCount containing the current restart count.
    BackoffSupervisor.Reset$
    Send this message to the BackoffSupervisor and it will reset the back-off.
    BackoffSupervisor.ResetRestartCount  
    BackoffSupervisor.ResetRestartCount$  
    BackoffSupervisor.RestartCount  
    BackoffSupervisor.RestartCount$  
    BackoffSupervisor.StartChild$  
    BackoffSupervisor$  
    CircuitBreaker
    Provides circuit breaker functionality to provide stability when working with "dangerous" operations, e.g.
    CircuitBreaker$
    Companion object providing factory methods for Circuit Breaker which runs callbacks in caller's thread

    Patterns
    "Pre Java 8" Java API for Akka patterns such as ask, pipe and others.
    Patterns$
    "Pre Java 8" Java API for Akka patterns such as ask, pipe and others.
    PatternsCS
    Java 8+ API for Akka patterns such as ask, pipe and others which work with CompletionStage.

    Java 8+ API for Akka patterns such as ask, pipe and others which work with CompletionStage.

    PromiseActorRef
    Akka private optimized representation of the temporary actor spawned to receive the reply to an "ask" operation.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AskTimeoutException
    This is what is used to complete a Future that is returned from an ask/? call, when it times out.
    CircuitBreakerOpenException
    Exception thrown when Circuit Breaker is open.
